item.dc:creator: @lostandfound lostandfound
item.description:
@lostandfound wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch™, post:30, topic:166918”]Maybe search this:

MonsterDropItem(int NPCID)[/quote]

[code]public void MonsterDropItem(int NPCID)
{
{
if (IsDropping == false) {
IsDropping = true;
int Play = GetNpcKiller(NPCID);
int Maxi = server.itemHandler.DropItemCount;
for (int i = 0; i <= Maxi; i++) {
if (server.itemHandler.DroppedItemsID[i] > 0) {
} else {
int NPCID2 = NPCID+34;
//System.out.println(“Npc id =” +NPCID);
if(npcs[NPCID] != null && server.playerHandler.players[Play] != null) {
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 50)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomKBD(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
ppl.addSkillXP(1050, 18);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 82)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomtrain(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
ppl.addSkillXP(55, 18);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 83)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomtrain(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
ppl.addSkillXP(55, 18);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1157)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomtrain(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
ppl.addSkillXP(60, 18);
}
// start of slayer house by pk3r kyle
if (npcs[NPCID].npcType >= 1616 && npcs[NPCID].npcType <= 1650)
{
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
if(ppl.playerLevel[18] >= 50) { //Stop nerds
ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomhouse(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ppl.addSkillXP(2500, 18);
}
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1614)
{
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
if(ppl.playerLevel[18] >= 50) { //Stop nerds
ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomhouse(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ppl.addSkillXP(2500, 18);
}
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1615)
{
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
if(ppl.playerLevel[18] >= 85) { // stop nerds …
ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomabyss(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ppl.addSkillXP(8500, 18);
}
}
// end of slayer house by pk3r kyle
if (npcs[NPCID].npcType >= 1192 && npcs[NPCID].npcType <= 1194)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(4558, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
ppl.addSkillXP(125, 18);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1154)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomtrain(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
ppl.addSkillXP(60, 18);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1156)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomtrain(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
ppl.addSkillXP(60, 18);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 53)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(1749, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomDrag(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
ppl.addSkillXP(225, 18);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 54)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(1747, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomDrag(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
ppl.addSkillXP(255, 18);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1975)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(4073, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1914)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(4667, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1913)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(1546, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1977)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(7297, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 182)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomtrain2(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
ppl.addSkillXP(145, 18);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 142)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomwhite(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
ppl.addSkillXP(375, 18);
}
if (npcs[NPCID].npcType >= 2025 && npcs[NPCID].npcType <= 2030)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randombarrows(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];
ppl.addSkillXP(435, 18);
}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2745)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomtzokjad(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);

client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];

}
if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1203)
{

ItemHandler.addItem(Item.tyras(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
ItemHandler.addItem(Item.tyras(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
